content: thank you for downloading the guernsey headband pattern by daisy stitch co this pattern is for an adult size headband but can be easily adjusted to make smaller or larger experience level advanced beginner materials yarn about 70 yds of worsted weight yarn crochet hook i/5 5mm scissors yarn needle tape measure gauge 13 stitches= 4 11 row= 4 be sure to check your gauge i tend to crochet tighter yours may be a little different i highly recommend doing a test swatch before getting started stitch abbreviations st = stitch chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch space = space skip = skip st single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet blo = back loop only- work st into back loop of current st 3rd loop = skip top 2 loops of st and work st into 3rd loop of current st behind work © other info chain at the beginning of a row does not count as a stitch pattern is for an adult size headband but can be easily adjusted to be larger or smaller now that we got all that out of the way let s crochet chain 66 for 20 circumference join ends of chain with slip_stitch taking care not to twist the chain row 1 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 1st chain and in each chain across slip_stitch in 1st half_double_crochet 66 half_double_crochet row 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop of each st around slip_stitch into 1st half_double_crochet 66 half_double_crochet row 3 chain 2 skip 1st st double_crochet in next st going behind double_crochet just made double_crochet in skip st *skip next st double_crochet in next st going behind the double_crochet just made double_crochet in skip st * repeat from * around slip_stitch into 1st x st 33 x s row 4 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st all the way around slip_stitch in 1st half_double_crochet 66 half_double_crochet row 5 repeat row 2 row 6 repeat row 3 row 7 repeat row 4 row 8 repeat row 2 fasten_off for a wider headband repeat row 2-4 until desired width this is an original pattern from daisy stitch co ©2019 please do not reprint repost or sell any parts of this pattern but feel free to link back to my website facebook instagram or pinterest you
